summary: SummaryHighlightsClean Ingredientsbelif's Aqua Bomb Hydrating Jelly Cleanser is a gentle jelly-to-foam cleanser with the same explosive burst of hydration as belif's cult favorite The true cream - aqua bomb, that gently removes all traces of makeup and impurities without stripping the skin of moisture.
details: DetailsBenefitsFormulated with the same hydrating properties as The true cream - aqua bomb, belif's Aqua bomb jelly cleanser provides a refreshing burst of hydration while cleansing the skinFormulated with amino acids and glycerin-based cleansing agents that gently remove makeup and impurities without stripping the skin of moistureIdeal for normal, oily, combination, and sensitive skinHelps with: dryness, dullness, the appearance of uneven texture, and clogged poresFree of mineral oils, petrolatum, synthetic organic dyes and fragrances, and ingredients of animal originDermatologically testedKey IngredientsLady's mantle: Helps remove free radicals from the skin while supporting natural cell turnoverNapiers Aqua Formula: Supports hyaluronic acid retentionFormulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesItem 2557465How To UseTake a penny-size amount of the product in your palm and lather with water. Massage gently and thoroughly over the face and rinse with lukewarm water. Use daily, morning and evening.Precautions: For external use only. Avoid contact with the eyes.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, Coco-Betaine, 1,2-Hexanediol, Potassium Cocoate, Lauramidopropyl Betaine, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Stellaria Media (Chickweed) Extract+ **, Alchemilla Vulgaris Leaf Extract**, Equisetum Arvense Leaf Extract**, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Leaf Extract**, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract+, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract+, Nepeta Cataria Extract+, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Leaf Extract+, Baptisia Tinctoria Root Extract+, Potassium Hydroxide, Sodium Chloride, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glyceryl Oleate, Coco-Glucoside, Butylene Glycol, Tetrasodium EDTA, Malachite Extract, Citric Acid, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil++, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil++, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil++, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil++, Limonene, Citronellol, Geraniol, Citral.*Napiers original formula**Napiers moisture formula+Fragrances of natural origin.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Take a penny-size amount of the product in your palm and lather with water. Massage gently and thoroughly over the face and rinse with lukewarm water. Use daily, morning and evening.Precautions: For external use only. Avoid contact with the eyes.
ingredients: Citral.*Napiers original formula**Napiers moisture formula+Fragrances of natural origin

reviews.headline: Great cleaner
reviews.comments: Cleans without stripping layers off of my skin. Also I don't need to use very much at a time.

reviews.headline: Squeaky Clean!
reviews.comments: This cleanser leaves my skin squeaky clean and feelinf refreshed. It smells amazing too.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: I have dry and kinda sensitive skin. While this is very hydrating it burns and makes me break out. This cleanser does have a smell, I personally love the smell, it is just not for sensitive skin because it's a little strong. I recommend for those without sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: New favorite face wash
reviews.comments: I was previously using oil of olay face wash and I purchased a belief gift box that included this cleanser and Aqua bomb moisturizer. Today i puchased the full size since I finished the travel size. I like how the wash makes my face feel, clean and refreshed. I feel a minty tingle as well, really great for these hot summer days. I highly recommend.

reviews.headline: Only thing that works!
reviews.comments: My boyfriend has eczema and acne on his face, and this is the only facewash that hasn't dried his skin out even more, and he's tried a lot. I also have dry skin and haven't had dry patches since I started using this.

reviews.headline: LOVE
reviews.comments: The texture is literally like jelly. Its easy to use and wash off, no residue. After washing it off, my face is so extremely soft. Love this stuff!!

reviews.headline: I enjoy this cleanser, but...
reviews.comments: I enjoy this as a follow up to a cleansing balm. However, please DO NOT put this near or on your eyes. It will irritate them. Other than that, it leaves my skin clean, hydrated and smells really nice.

reviews.headline: Gentle, effective, great smell, long lasting.￼
reviews.comments: Ihave very sensitive skin and most cleansers are too harsh for me. I was a little worried about this due to the slight cooling effect, but it has worked out. I love the smell and find it immensely refreshing. I bought this in March of last year and I'm still using the same bottle. I was out of town a few times and used one of the trial sizes then, but still despite the fact that this is a little bit expensive, it certainly lasted and worth the money. I do occasionally need to wash my face twice but I do not consider that much of a drawback considering how little needs to be used and how gentle it is.￼ I also occasionally use a stronger cleanser if my face feels extra grubby.￼ It's a fantastic product and I would be interested if Belif had a shower gel/body cleanser.￼

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: I usually LOVE belief moisturizers and think they are amazing so when I ran into ulta to grab this face wash I had high hopes. Ever since I've been using this products I'm red, dried out all around my t zone and flaking, and breaking out on my forehead. Really wanted to love this because I love the consistency of this product but it made me skin look awful.

reviews.headline: I absolutely love this product
reviews.comments: I love how cleansing and foamy this is! It gently washes all the dirt off my face without stripping it dry. It also rinses easily in hard water or in hotels that use water softener. I will forever use this product

reviews.headline: Made me red and itchy!
reviews.comments: I have never had such a bad experience with a cleanser before. I used it once and it immediately made my skin red, itchy, and dry. This is definitely NOT "for all skin types" as they advertise.

reviews.headline: Great cleanser
reviews.comments: Perfect cleanser for all skin types . Really lathers up and removes makeup including eye makeup . Nice smell and lasts long . Gentle cleanser

reviews.headline: WHAT happened?
reviews.comments: I have been using this face wash along with Belif True Aqua Bomb consistently for well over a year now. I had used these products off and on 5 years ago or so and loved them. My skin was loving it..until recently. Something in the new batches of these products is different. After purchasing new in both those items, my skin has become red, inflamed, itchy and just over all ticked off. I don't know what happened. They must have changed ingredients slightly, I'm not certain. I am certain that I will no longer be purchasing Belif products and will be switching back over to Murad.

reviews.headline: Are the samples a different formula??
reviews.comments: I had a sample of this and absolutely loved it. So much so that I later purchased the full size bottle. Was so disappointed that the full size item seemed to be a completely different formula and even smelled different. It also doesn't do much when it comes to acne or any breakouts. The sample I had smelled amazing and slightly citrusy, left a refreshing and clean feeling. The full size product smells like nothing and doesn't feel refreshing or clean. Incredibly underwhelming and disappointed with this. I wanted to love it so bad. Won't be purchasing again especially for the huge price tag on this. Not worth the money in the slightest.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: Does not leave a clean feeling on the face after a wash. Felt like using Irish Springs, instead of Dove on your face if you know what I mean.

reviews.headline: Good quality and quantity
reviews.comments: I didn't believe it at first when I was recommended this product that with a smaller amount it would go a long way but it truly does. I noticed my face isn't dry even when I wash it more than once when I'm doing facials or trying to remove waterproof/difficult makeup.

reviews.headline: I have tried many different cleansers, and always come back
reviews.comments: This product makes my skin feel so clean. i have dry, sensitive, and acne prone skin. it doesn't dry out my skin whatsoever. it doesn't irritate my skin whatsoever. and it actually has helped me prevent breakouts. i am so in love. the only thing is that she is a bit pricey, but to me she's fully worth it.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Anything from BELIF is worth it but this especially

reviews.headline: Love this brand
reviews.comments: I adore belif skincare was super excited to try this jelly cleanser! It did not disappoint, and I even got my husband using it because he loves the scent. The scent is not harsh by the way and has not caused either of us irritation. I have dry skin and this cleanses without drying me out too much. I love the consistency and follow up with my belif aqua bomb moisturizer!

reviews.headline: underwhelming, gave me a rash
reviews.comments: I used this daily for two weeks and ended up with a bumpy rash on one side of my face.

a little goes a long way

faceoff_positive.comments:
My routine is:
- (NIGHT only) Cleanse w/ DHC Oil Cleanser first
- Wash w/ this product (2x/daily)
- (day) Thayers Witch Hazel Toner (night) Ordinary Glycolic Acid Toner
- Ordinary Caffeine Eye Cream
- Acne Spot Treatment
- Peach&Lily's Peach Slices Citrus-Honey Aqua Glow 
- Problem Solution Moisturizer

I have COMBO-OILY skin, and I sleep on my stomach sometimes and having your face smushed by a pillow is NOT good for the skin at all.  This product is one of the only face cleansers that don't overly dry out my face, treats my sensitive skin well, and helps prevent more breakouts.  It has a light orange scent and lathers well.  When I use my hands to wash, I always make sure to work jelly cleansers like this into a good lather first before washing my face, I feel like the foam penetrates the skin a little more and breaks down leftover oil cleanser, dirt and grime, and sebum.  When I use Aqua Bomb cleanser with my Clarisonic cleansing brush, my face feels super clean afterwards, like I FEEL the clean on the skin and it's just so nice especially after a long day at work.
faceoff_positive.headline: I believe in Belif

faceoff_negative.comments: I had a sample of this and absolutely loved it. So much so that I later purchased the full size bottle. Was so disappointed that the full size item seemed to be a completely different formula and even smelled different. It also doesn't do much when it comes to acne or any breakouts. The sample I had smelled amazing and slightly citrusy, left a refreshing and clean feeling. The full size product smells like nothing and doesn't feel refreshing or clean. Incredibly underwhelming and disappointed with this. I wanted to love it so bad. Won't be purchasing again especially for the huge price tag on this. Not worth the money in the slightest.
faceoff_negative.headline: Are the samples a different formula??
